description: Two figures, one face up, one face down; left figure lies on face, turned slightly toward PL; arms bent at elbows, forearms under body; right figure lies with arms at sides; base is octagonal
markings: White paint, underside of base, \'113\'; sticker, underside of base, under scotch tape, \'113\'
object_name: Goldweight [Two Recumbent Figures on an Octagonal Base]
title: Goldweight [Two Recumbent Figures on an Octagonal Base]
